snippet.title: Phineas and Ferb the Movie: Across the 2nd Dimension (DS) - Gameplay - Full Game - No Commentary
snippet.description: Phineas and Ferb: Across the 2nd Dimension is a video game based on the TV movie of the same name and the first multi-platform game in the Phineas and Ferb video game series. It was released in August 2011 to coincide with the premiere of the film for Wii, Nintendo DS, PlayStation Portable, and PlayStation 3. An Xbox 360 version was planned for release, but was cancelled due to Disney wanting the game to capitalize on the motion control capabilities of the Wii Remote, which the Xbox 360 Kinect was unable to perform because of its full body tracking functionality.
